remarks: The Axiom of Separation of IZF set theory.  Axiom 6 of [Crosilla], p. "Axioms of CZF and IZF" (with unnecessary quantifier removed, and with a ` F/ y ph ` condition replaced by a distinct variable constraint between ` y ` and ` ph ` ). The Separation Scheme is a weak form of Frege's Axiom of Comprehension, conditioning it (with ` x e. z ` ) so that it asserts the existence of a collection only if it is smaller than some other collection ` z ` that already exists.  This prevents Russell's paradox ~ ru .  In some texts, this scheme is called "Aussonderung" or the Subset Axiom. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2006.)
statement:
ax-sep $p |- E. y A. x ( x e. y <-> ( x e. z /\ ph ) ) $.
$d ph y z $.
$d x y z $.
